plugins.name: project-planning
plugins.description: Engineering and construction project planning with toll gate process. Scope analysis, three-alternative comparison, FEED, AACE cost estimates, CPM scheduling, procurement strategy, constructability, value engineering, risk management, and permits through Design Freeze.

plugins.name: quantum-computing
plugins.description: Explain quantum computing concepts through structured pedagogical workflows with LaTeX rendering. 15 skills covering quantum mechanics, algebra, algorithms, entanglement, teleportation, density matrices, QFT, experiments, hardware, and history.

plugins.name: concept-builder
plugins.description: Learn like the pioneers -- core principles first, formalism second. Domain-agnostic concept breakdowns with LaTeX, conceptual maps, CTQ mastery criteria, deep-dive expansion, side-by-side comparison, and learning paths.

plugins.name: greek-tragedy
plugins.description: Classify Greek tragedies as Apollonian, Dionysiac, or mixture using Nietzsche's Birth of Tragedy framework. Six-dimensional analysis across chorus, individuation, suffering, resolution, language, and body/boundaries. Includes 11 source texts and classifications.

plugins.name: arabic-pdf-translator
plugins.description: Arabic PDF OCR and ensemble translation. Multi-engine OCR (Tesseract + EasyOCR + PaddleOCR) with 7-stage preprocessing, 4-method translation ensemble (Claude, Google, DeepL, OpenAI), and quality evaluation with Claude-as-judge arbitration.

plugins.name: cost-engineer
plugins.description: Full cost engineering suite for EPC and construction projects. Estimation methods (parametric, factored, bottom-up), benchmarking (AACE, IPA, CEPCI), earned value management, change order pricing, and lifecycle cost analysis with spreadsheet analysis.

plugins.name: board-meeting-sim
plugins.description: Simulate a board of directors meeting. Present a proposal, get it debated by six directors (Chair, CEO, CFO, COO, GC, Independent) with distinct perspectives, and receive a formal vote with conditions and action items.

plugins.name: manim-video-creator
plugins.description: Create mathematical animation videos using Manim Community Edition. Describe what you want and get a rendered MP4. Includes scene authoring, rendering at multiple quality levels, and comprehensive Manim CE 0.20.0 API knowledge.
